elements.text:
You go to your parents' home for the first time in a while and notice that your father looks a lot less healthy than you remember. Neither one of your parents mentions anything about his health. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

texts: He's probably going to pass away soon.
My father is glad that I'm visiting.
He looks so happy to be with family.
I wonder what is going on with his health, but reassure myself that my family takes care of him.
I think about whether my parents are keeping something from me, but tell myself that I can't control my father's health.
